Html:
Hi to all,
i have just downloaded the latest version of rawr (13.1b) and i am experiencing some problems.
I have selected model of lock and i can reload my current character from armory. But when i download him i don't get the enchants on my items (i have to put them manualy) and most importantly in the options/shw talents button ...when i press it i get a window that says on top druid talent tree (though my model is set to lock) and has 3 labels blank with nothing on them.
not calculating my talents gives me the wrong results so i could use some help please.
Am i doing something wrong?
File > Load from Armory is what you want to do. You're creating a new blank character, then loading just the items from your armory, which isn't very helpful in your situation.
